html:
5.10.20  11:38 pm   Is the earth round

      yes, and flat. it is disc shaped

5.10.20  11:24 pm   What bad thing did you do?

      i have never done a bad thing. i have only done good things, and a few things that are mildly questionable

5.10.20  11:18 pm   can you write a new song

      i will write an entire avalanche of songs

5.10.20  11:17 pm   what is your favorite vegetable?

      dust

5.10.20  11:12 pm   Can you do a barrel roll?

      i am saving most of my barrel rolls for later

5.10.20  11:06 pm   What is a word in the English language that can be used in any situation?

      oh

5.10.20  11:00 pm   is north dakota real? asking for a friend.

      yes, but i can't prove it

5.10.20  11:00 pm   where should i aim my telescope? 

      into the mirror

5.10.20  10:54 pm   Should cereal be legally a soup?

      at a certain point, where do you draw the line

5.10.20  10:44 pm   pineapple on pizza?

      save the pineapples for the bedroom

5.10.20  10:32 pm   Hello ! How do you feel about giraffes ?

      they are not only tall, but also very wide

5.10.20  10:24 pm   do you like the fact that it rains diamonds on saturn?

      yes, IF true

5.10.20  10:19 pm   do you ever sleep?

      that sounds so familiar

5.10.20  10:06 pm   Opinion on speed?

      too fast

5.10.20  10:04 pm   am i going crazy?

      everything has always been crazy

5.10.20  9:32 pm   Earlier you responded to my question about how to be more productive, and you responded with saying you could give advice if you had context. Here's the context: I'm writing a novel about creativity.

      describe your progress so far

5.10.20  9:12 pm   is cereal a type of soup?

      no

5.10.20  9:01 pm   What's your favorite type of monkey?

      complicated

5.10.20  9:00 pm   should i introduce wonderful complexity and simplicity to people?

      yes, but they might already know about it

5.10.20  8:53 pm   Do you think there is such a thing as a bad idea,

     sure

     if so, can you describe your bad ideas?

      destroying the unverse, don't worry i cancelled that idea

5.10.20  8:33 pm   do you like techno ology? personally I despise it, with its only benefits being able to connect everyone together and keeping everyone fed and healthy.

     that seems pretty far reaching. plus there's even more benefits than that

      other than that, techno ology has many attributes that are meant to harm. also I despise looking at a screen to have fun, but due to this global lockdown, there is a limited selection of other things to do.

     soon technology will get so good you won't need a screen

5.10.20  8:31 pm   What's your favorite guitar string?

      b

5.10.20  8:28 pm   Pineapple on pizza?

      pineapple is pizza

5.10.20  8:20 pm   how do i be "cool"?

      impossible. it can't be done

5.10.20  7:50 pm   What is your favourite chord?

      F

5.10.20  7:02 pm   Is the will to share ideas through art just a trick your mind is playing with you in order to make you share information about yourself instead?

     i think so

     Are you your ideas?

      some of them

5.10.20  6:38 pm   Why don't people use spoons for cutting things?

      not sharp enough

5.10.20  6:25 pm   How long until a joke gets old?

     1 day

     How do I make it fresh again?

      twist/turn it

5.10.20  6:19 pm   Is cereal soup?

      it's actually a sandwich

5.10.20  5:44 pm   If I eat a bus does that make me a duck?

      no

5.10.20  5:38 pm   Why do carrots exist

      to ENTICE you

5.10.20  5:17 pm   why does this page exist

      for science

5.10.20  4:57 pm   Do you love civilization? 

      yes

5.10.20  4:18 pm   what is your opinion on the pandemic so far? i wanted zombies

      you're supposed to be the zombie

5.10.20  3:53 pm   Sharp 11 or Flat 13?

      depends on the other notes and the entire rest of the song actually

5.10.20  3:50 pm   do you ever think "fuck" when going to produce a song? mainly because its so hard to capture that which rings about in your brain?

      yes

5.10.20  3:44 pm   can we here an example of your "writing sound"

      sure

5.10.20  3:36 pm   what is a meaningful way to express appreciation for another person's way of being?

      saying 'hi'

5.10.20  3:23 pm   What are you working on

      re-inventing the graphics department

5.10.20  3:23 pm   Are good and evil the same thing?

      they are close cousins

5.10.20  3:22 pm   pizza on another pizza?

      that sounds lovely

5.10.20  3:21 pm   What inspired you to make music

      music

5.10.20  3:13 pm   As a artist which do you think is more important: the emotions/inspirations from the artist making the art piece, or the interpreter(s) experiencing/engaging with the piece once it is finished?

      It's all good, as long as the slash mark is used/utilized.

5.10.20  2:59 pm   What is your opinion on Mars?

      "just right"

5.10.20  2:36 pm   why is it called seafood? shouldn't meat then be called landfood?

      if it comes from the land, and if it's served to people who live mostly in the sea. then it would make sense maybe

5.10.20  2:21 pm   I heard you capitalize in hell and heck, why them and not others?

     Yes others. you are 'mistaken'

     And also, I meant letters in hell not actual hell... don't capitalize on hell...please..

5.10.20  2:15 pm   are airplanes birds but made of steel

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

5.10.20  1:36 pm   why is everything bill wurtz-y uncapitalized? 

      maybe no one wants to steal my trade mark, of using capital letters

5.10.20  1:31 pm   which music genre is the best?

      Respectable

5.10.20  1:23 pm   could you tell me a paradox?

      there is no such thing as a paradox
